mapper.update: INSERT INTO POST_BOOKMARKS(POST_ID, USER_ID, BOOKMARK_YN) values (#{postId}, #{userId}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE BOOKMARK_YN=IF(BOOKMARK_YN, 0, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE POST_BOOKMARKS WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND POST_ID=#{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(POST_ID) FROM POST_BOOKMARKS WHERE POST_ID=#{postId} AND USER_ID=#{userId}
